Incoming¶

Incoming is an integration of bearychat.

Examples¶

Here is a simple incoming workflow:

from bearychat import incoming

data = {
    "text": "hello, **world**",
    "markdown": True,
    "notification": "Hello, BearyChat in Notification",
    "channel": "testing"
}

resp = incoming.send(
     "https://hook.bearychat.com/=bw52O/incoming/token",
     data)
